The 5DayForecast extension replaces your New Tab Search Engine and provides a new search experience with search results by Microsoft Bing.

Here's how you can access this functionality:
Install the extension and search using the New Tab Search Bar!

By clicking "Add to chrome", I accept and agree to installing 5DayForecast Chrome Weather Extension and setting New tab search bar to bing.com that provided by the service, Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.

Please read carefully: By installing this application, you agree to the End User License Agreement and the Privacy Policy. 

Disclosure: Search Provider will be changed to Microsoft Bing
